summary: The meeting focused on orienting Michael to a new project planning tool that shows value streams, resource allocation, and project timelines. The tool allows visualization and adjustment of project timelines and resource requirements. The discussion began with casual conversation about AI avatars and travel before moving to the business agenda.
key_topics: Introduction to new project planning tool functionality
decisions: To review current projects only, filtering out completed work
To use t-shirt sizing for initial estimates with understanding they are approximate
action_items: Add differentiation between t-shirt sized vs fully scoped projects in the tool
Review and validate projects within each value stream
Add maintenance project category for Salesforce activities
concerns: Accuracy of t-shirt sizing estimates vs actual hours needed
michael_priorities: Understanding how to provide most effective feedback
Clarification on how to review the information presented
Visibility and readability of the tool interface
commitments: Team will update tool to distinguish between t-shirt sized and fully scoped projects
Will review each value stream individually for validation
